title: Calories in a Domino's Pizza Slice
meta_description: Discover calories in dominos slice for a standard cheese pizza, including macros, sodium, and variations for different toppings or crusts.
h1: Calories in a Domino's Pizza Slice
assumptions: One slice from a medium (12-inch) hand-tossed crust cheese pizza; 8 slices per pizza; no extra toppings or modifications.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by location, exact recipe, crust type, toppings, and portion size. Check Domino's app or website for current values.

quick_answer.text: One slice of Domino's medium cheese pizza has about 200 kcal and 9 g protein.

label_note: Values mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison with Domino's provided data.

faqs.q: How many calories in a Domino's cheese slice?
faqs.a: Approximately 200 kcal for one medium hand-tossed slice.

faqs.q: What are the carbs in a Domino's pizza slice?
faqs.a: About 25 g carbs per slice, mostly from the crust.

faqs.q: Does Domino's slice have high sodium?
faqs.a: Yes, around 500 mg sodium per slice due to cheese and sauce.

faqs.q: Calories in Domino's slice with veggies?
faqs.a: Similar base ~200 kcal; veggies add minimal calories but fiber.

faqs.q: How does crust type affect calories in Domino's slice?
faqs.a: Hand-tossed ~200 kcal; thin crust lower at ~160 kcal; deep dish higher at ~250 kcal.
